description: I serve as the Secretary of the Household Division in the Student Association of the Department of Electrical Engineering, where I assist the division head, manage office supplies to support the organizationâ€™s secretarial functions, record and prepare meeting minutes, and help enforce organizational rules to ensure compliance among all staff members.

As a Research and Development Staff at the Student Association of Politeknik Negeri Semarang, I am responsible for overseeing, providing feedback, and evaluating every work program and agenda carried out by the association members during the 2024/2025 period.

As an intern at PT Ruang Industri Indonesia, I successfully developed a project titled ESP32-Based Bottle Cap Quality Control System with my team of three members. I programmed an ESP32 microcontroller in C++ to control an actuator (servo motor) based on messages received from an image processing system via MQTT. Additionally, I developed a C++ program for an Arduino UNO microcontroller to operate the conveyor motor.
